title: Client Groups Management
description: Organize related clients into groups for consolidated management and reporting
overview: Client Groups allow you to organize related entities (subsidiaries, sister concerns, related parties) under a parent structure. This enables consolidated case views, group-level reporting, and efficient management of multi-entity clients.
